about_the_game:
This Fallstreak Fan Pack contains each of the following:

Fallstreak Prototype Novel
A 60,000 word prototype novel written early in Fallstreak’s development featuring a unique, self-contained story that follows after Cecil in an apocalyptic rendition of Socotrine.

Fallstreak Original Soundtrack
23 high-quality audio tracks, composed and recorded by Centi.

High-Resolution Wallpapers
10 wallpapers featuring hi-res images of the best of Fallstreak’s art.

Fallstreak Developer Art Book
A special digital art book containing concept and iteration art as well as specs and direction notes that delve into the underlying vision behind Fallstreak’s unique aesthetic.

Accessing the Fan Pack
After purchasing and downloading the Fallstreak Fan Pack, go into Fallstreak's Properties by right-clicking it in the Steam library and find the "Browse Local Files" button under the "Local Files" tab. This will take you to the Fallstreak game directory, where you can access all included content.

Fallstreak Developer Art Book
A special digital art book containing concept and iteration art as well as specs and direction notes that delve into the underlying vision behind Fallstreak’s unique aesthetic.

Accessing the Fan Pack
After purchasing and downloading the Fallstreak Fan Pack, go into Fallstreak's Properties by right-clicking it in the Steam library and find the "Browse Local Files" button under the "Local Files" tab. This will take you to the Fallstreak game directory, where you can access all included content.
legal_notice: Fallstreak is copyrighted by Centicerise Productions
name: Fallstreak - Fan Pack
short_description: Additional content for fans that would like to help support Fallstreak!
